column5: Several years ago I heard about great fishing to be had at this lake located west of the town of Red Lake, but since haven't heard anything about it or can I find a resort or outfitter that uses the lake.Does anyone have any knowledge or info about it? SARG
I was there many years ago, so times have changed, I am sure. The camp was Jubilee Outposts and they do have a website. I searched on Yahoo.
I was there many years ago, so times have changed, I am sure. The camp was Jubilee Outposts and they do have a website. I searched on Yahoo.
Go to this site. I think you will find what you're looking for.http://www.ontariossunsetcountry.ca/...code=41&tbid=7 Brad
The lodge is still there. Check out Medicine-stone.com

what about the fishing there? how is it? similar to the lakes close by ...gullrock, red, nungesser, or little vermillion?
